reasons_to_visit.details: Český Krumlov's small but charming Christmas markets in the main square offer a cozy, authentic experience without overwhelming crowds.
The medieval town becomes even more magical under snow, creating perfect fairy-tale photo opportunities.
Fewer tourists allow for a more intimate experience of the historic town's winter beauty.
Spectacular New Year's Eve fireworks over the illuminated castle provide an unforgettable celebration.
Perfect time for museum visits, traditional Czech dining, and exploring the town's historic interiors.

reasons_to_avoid.details: December temperatures regularly drop below freezing, requiring warm winter clothing for outdoor exploration.
River activities are suspended, and castle gardens are closed for the winter season.
Very limited daylight hours restrict sightseeing time and photography opportunities.
Certain outdoor attractions and some restaurants may have reduced hours or seasonal closures.
